    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User()
        Default constructor.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password)
        Overloaded constructor. The only way to have a signup_date on your newly created user is by passing through this constructor.
        Parameters:
        email - the user's email address. Functions as the ID of said user.
        password - the user's password. Will be stored in plain text in this version.

    • Method Detail

        email getter.
        Returns:
        the user's email.

        java.lang.String getPassword()
        password getter. It is package-private, since it sees no use outside the model package.
        Returns:
        the user's password.

      • getSignUpDate

        public java.util.Date getSignUpDate()
        signup_date getter.
        Returns:

      • setSignUpDate

        private void setSignUpDate(java.util.Date signup_date)
        signup_date setter. Can only be called upon user creation.
        Parameters:
        signup_date - the new sign up date.

      • setLastSignIn

        void setLastSignIn()
        last_signin setter. Upon call will automatically update the parameter with the current time. It is package-private, since it sees no use outside the model package.

      • addUserSet

        boolean addUserSet(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Checks the existence of the Key/Value pair in the user's set and adds it. It is package-private, since it sees no use outside the model package.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key of the Key/Value pair.
        value - The Value of the Key/Value pair.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was completed successfully, false otherwise.

      • removeUserSet

        boolean removeUserSet(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Checks the existence of the Key/Value pair in the user's set and deletes it. It is package-private, since it sees no use outside the model package.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key of the Key/Value pair.
        value - The Value of the Key/Value pair.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was completed successfully, false otherwise.
